There were no other sightings in Glasgow on or around August 22nd 2007
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: hovered at first then moved on
divs: sighting detailsmy wife and i were sunbathing about 5pm i got up and went to get a drink of water when a passenger plane passed overhead i looked up and couldnt take my eyes off this object that was hovering above the plane as if to let it pass \ im sure the pilot must have seen it\\ i went into my house and got my camcorder and asked my wife if it was still about\ she pointed to where it was flying and i got some good but shaky footage of the disc shaped object i put it on my tv and took some pictures of it and iwas quite surprised to see it was not a plane \i have shown some pictures to friends and they cant believe what they see \i followed the craft into a cloud and thought it would come out at a certain place but it went to the right as i can see on my tv but when you look into the camcorder all you can see is black and white so when it went into the cloud i couldnt focus on it and lost it iwas looking in the direction i thought it would go but it went the other way
